parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

parameters.name: FirewallSubnetCidr
parameters.description: The subnet CIDR block of the VPC in which the ENI of the firewall is stored in automatic mode.

parameters.name: FirewallVpcCidr
parameters.description: The CIDR block that is allocated to the VPC created for the VPC firewall in automatic mode.

parameters.name: FirewallVpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC in which the ENI associated with the VPC firewall is created in manual mode.

parameters.name: FirewallVswitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch that is used to create the ENI in manual mode.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description: The region ID of the route router.

parameters.name: RouteMode
parameters.description:
The routing mode of the VPC firewall. Valid values:

*   **managed**: automatic mode
*   **manual**: manual mode

parameters.name: TrAttachmentMasterCidr
parameters.description: The primary subnet CIDR block that the VPC uses to connect to the transit router in automatic mode.

parameters.name: TrAttachmentSlaveCidr
parameters.description: The secondary subnet CIDR block that the VPC uses to connect to the transit router in automatic mode.

parameters.name: TransitRouterId
parameters.description: The ID of the transit router.
